text:
Hi packagers, I'm trying to register my first package and tried to follow the JuliaRegistrator instructions and guidelines to update my initial version number, but rather than updating my pull request it seems to have created a new one:
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/30834>
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/30854>
This is probably my fault, but could someone please close the first (v0.3.0) PR? :slightly_smiling_face:

elements.text: Hi packagers, I'm trying to register my first package and tried to follow the JuliaRegistrator instructions and guidelines to update my initial version number, but rather than updating my pull request it seems to have created a new one:
This is probably my fault, but could someone please close the first (v0.3.0) PR?

text: any idea why precompilation times out after one hour? :confused:

elements.text: any idea why precompilation times out after one hour?

text: Yep, I'm downloading some very large artifacts. Currently working on a branch that will do that more lazily.

elements.text: Yep, I'm downloading some very large artifacts. Currently working on a branch that will do that more lazily.

text: (i.e. I think it's the build part that's timing out)
